Articles.Content:
Now the latest edition to my fleet I have my bomber. Orginaly designed to get rid of my debris the the end of the runway it is fast, quite agile and has a mediocre range.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34767[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]34768[/ATTACH]

Here is the download http://www./?b0b94935x2w130q

It has a max speed of roughly 600 m/s

A high payload if destributed well

It can pull up from 2000m at 250 m/s

It has two extra external fuel tanks as well as five internal tanks which is a total of 900 liters of fuel and as standard it carries ten extra fusalages to be used as bombs.

I only use vanila as it is HARDCORE!

Mods are for N00BS.

Feel free to repost your modded version or changed rendition.

Edited October 14, 2012 by sal_vager
